TopicTitle: The SpaceM Nastybird GL and GL Cargo

Articles.Content:
I'm really happy with how this thing turned out. I'll be posting the .craft files if anyone wants em.

Presenting the SpaceM Nastybird GL and GL Cargo. Performance Space Shuttles for a Performance Age.

Javascript is disabled. View full album

Typical mission profile is as follows:

Ascent to orbit, limiting acceleration to 20m/s in MJ

Either ditch launcher and circularize OR use launcher to circularize depending on launcher model.

Rendezvous with space station and deliver/receive passengers/science OR launch satellite/probe

Return to KSC using soupy atmosphere to brake unrealistically fast.

Glide in to a landing at KSC

Abort is bound to the parachutes - in an emergency or if coming down over the ocean or in a bad landing spot, simply mash the big red button and four parachutes will flop you unceremoniously around to a safe landing.

Lights are bound to the cabin lights because decor is important. The seats are made from the finest Korinthian leather and the in-flight entertainment system will keep your guests entertained on even the longest flights.

1. toggles front landing light

2. toggles docking port doors

3. toggles cargo/support bay doors

4. toggles extra pairs of translation RCS ports fore/aft. (Useful to deorbit if out of fuel)

5. toggle cargo bay lights (GL Cargo model only)

If anyone wants it let me know!

Very nice looking craft.

I would like to see the craft files.
